title: Crime Alert 04.04.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.04.19
description:
New York City jury finds Chanel Lewis GUILTY of murdering the Queens jogger. Minnesota Representative faces investigation for allegedly using thousands in campaign funds for personal use. Beijing police arrest kindergarten teacher for allegedly poisoning 23 students.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
